extendedInfo.description: For VOA news listener, VOA Standard English Player is a great RSS client for mobile that provide a convenient way to listen English news from VOA web site, include RSS categories:1. News2. USA3. Africa4. Americas5. Asia6. Europe7. Middle East8. American Life9. Arts and Entertainment10. Hollywood Highlights11. Music12. Literature13. Art and Culture14. Economy15. Religion16. SportsFEATURES* Listen to VOA episode while reading the transcript.* High-light conversation sentences in the transcript.* Translate news to your language.* Download transcript and mp3 into device for offline listening and reading.* Automatic play the next news.* Support replay mode on all news item.* Support landscape mode.* Support background playback.* Display all items count and unread items count for every feed.

reviews.title: best voa apps
reviews.comment: Really like the auto scroll and highlighted text while playing audio. But I wish it could resume download and background downloading.
reviews.author: John Andreys

reviews.title: Experia so-01b
reviews.comment: Thank you for creating  good software. But I think I have an error. When I play audios from the category, it plays different audio from the subject.
reviews.author: A Google User
